summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) population monitoring roster and daily log for the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York) dated August 2, 2019. It lists hundreds of inmates with their registration numbers, names, and admission/status details. The daily log section shows status changes for several inmates on that date. Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an inmate with an admission status of 'A-PRE' (likely present). This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York dated August 2, 2019. It includes daily logs, transfer receipts, prisoner remand forms, and a release authorization, detailing the movement, status, and charges of numerous inmates. The records show administrative prisoner transfers and remands, with some inmates noted as having charges related to civil contempt or as material witnesses.

events.title: Daily Log Updates at MCC New York
events.description: The daily log shows various administrative changes for inmates, including 'HLD REMOVE' (hold removed), 'ADM CHANGE' (admission change), and 'GCT REL' (good conduct time release).

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Admission to MCC New York
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein's admission date to the facility is listed as July 8, 2019, with status 'A-PRE'.

events.title: Prisoner Transfers and Remands at MCC New York
events.description: Administrative records show numerous inmates being transferred, remanded to custody, or released from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Release of Inmate Jerlaine Hallwood
events.description: Inmate Jerlaine Hallwood is authorized for release from MCC New York at 9:00 AM.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York)
MCC New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as an inmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC NY) with a registration number and an admission date of July 8, 2019.
The document is a comprehensive inmate roster and daily administrative log for the federal detention facility dated August 2, 2019.
The roster contains hundreds of inmate names, registration numbers, and admission/status codes, indicating it is a standard BOP population management document.
The daily log section shows real-time administrative actions (e.g., hold removals, admission changes) for other inmates on August 2, 2019.
Epstein's presence in this official BOP roster confirms his incarceration at MCC New York prior to his death.
The documents are Bureau of Prisons administrative records from August 2, 2019, detailing inmate movements at MCC New York.
Several prisoner remand forms list charges categorized as 'CIVIL CONTEMPT' or 'MATERIAL WITNESS', though no specific case names are attached to these charges in this document.
A transfer receipt lists nine inmates (e.g., Pavels Erncs, Edward Binyard) being transferred with a status of 'HLD-REMOVE'.
Inmate Jerlaine Hallwood was authorized for release from MCC New York on the morning of August 2, 2019.
The records include rosters showing inmates designated for courts in the Southern District of New York (SDNY) and Eastern District of New York (EDNY).
